summary: Jay doesn't believe in love Stories, and Simran, is a girl who's in love with the idea of Love itself.
cast: Imran Khan|Sonam Kapoor|Sammir Dattani|Samir Soni|Kavin Dave|Bruna Abdullah|Aseem Tiwari|Aamir Ali|Pooja Rawal|Ketki Dave|Anju Mahendru|Shireesh Sharma|Khushboo Shroff|Rohit D'Souza|Avantika Malik Khan|Omkaar|Anuraag Pandey|Simon Tyrrell
title: I Hate Luv Storys
